title: Ticket #7222: condor_token_* looks in the wrong directory when run as root
description:
Report from FNAL:

When run as root, condor_token_* looks in funny places. For example, it writes the token in the system directory instead of the (expected) root home directory.

We should ensure that the tools understand they are not daemons and behave appropriately.
creator: bbockelm
